A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie made me sign up as an audience reviewer on Rotten Tomatoes. I have been a life long Star Wars fan for thirty-six years. Born and raised next door to Skywalker Ranch\, ILM\, Lucasfilm... I was so excited to see this film.
This is not just a bad Star Wars movie\, this is a Horrible movie in general. The acting throughout the cast is terrible. (With the exception of the character of "Rose") The plot and story are terrible. Terribly written and terribly portrayed. The only surprise that comes to you during the film is that it actually ends. 
It is beyond obvious that Kathleen Kennedy and company are pushing for strong female leaders\, white men are the devil\, and the beauty of diversity is struggling against white male authority. As a white male myself I could watch that if it was done well\, as in an artistic\, well done movie with thought\, planning\, writing\, and special effects to support that story. This film had none of that! They came very close in The Force Awakens. That films subtle humor actually added to the story. They tried over the top humor in this film and it detracted greatly from the saga.
In summary this film is horrible! 
As a movie fan\, it made me want to walk out of the theatre.
As Star Wars fan\, it made me want to blow my head off.
They should have titled this move "The Phantom Menace 2"
